# isCompatibleWithAirPlayVideo

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the asset is compatible with AirPlay Video.

## Declaration

```swift
var isCompatibleWithAirPlayVideo: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

This property value is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if you can play this asset’s content to an external AirPlay device, like an Apple TV.
title: isCompatibleWithAirPlayVideo
